# é¡¶éƒ¨æŒ‰é’®çƒçš„åˆ¶ä½œæ€è·¯

æŒ‰é’®çš„æ ·å¼éšæ„ï¼Œé‡è¦çš„æ ·å¼æ˜¯å®šä½ï¼šposition: relative; ç›¸å¯¹å®šä½ä¿æŒä¸åŠ¨ï¼Œè€ŒæŒ‰é’®çƒåˆ™ä½¿ç”¨ position:absolute ç»å¯¹å®šä½ï¼Œleft:0; æš‚æ—¶ä¿æŒä¸åŠ¨ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ transform: translate(-1px); ä¼˜åŒ–ä¸€ä¸‹è¾¹æ¡†æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼Œéšåç‚¹å‡»å°çƒæ—¶ï¼Œå°†å®ƒçš„ left å¢åŠ è‡³å¤§æŒ‰é’®çš„ widthï¼Œå³å¯å®Œæˆå°çƒçš„ç§»åŠ¨

HTML æ„æ¶

<div class="button">
    <div class="ball"></div>
</div>

CSS æ ·å¼

.button {
    width: 60px;
    height: 25px;
    background-color: #2f3a8f;
    border-radius: 25px;
    position: relative;
}

/** æŒ‰é’®çƒ */
.ball {
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #feece9;
    left: 0;
    border-radius: 50px;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px #000;
    transition: 0.5s;
    transform: translate(-1px);
}

JS é€»è¾‘

let index = 0;
button.addEventListener("click", () => {
    if (index == 0) {
        index = 1;
        ball.style.left = 61 + "%";
    } else {
        index = 0;
        ball.style.left = 0 + "%";
    }
});

# HTLM æ¶æ„
<div class="bottom">
    <div class="signIn">
        <h2>Signin</h2>
        <input type="text" placeholder="Username" />
        <input type="password" placeholder="Password" />
        <button>Go</button>
    </div>
    <div class="signUp">
        <h2>SignUp</h2>
        <input type="text" placeholder="Username" />
        <input type="password" placeholder="Password" />
        <input type="password" placeholder="confirm Password" />
        <button>Go</button>
    </div>
</div>
# CSS æ ·å¼
.bottom {
    margin-top: 20px;
    width: 300px;
    height: 250px;
    background-image: url(../æœå›¾å¯¼èˆª_91sotu.com_1643375286981.png);
    /** å¼€å¯å…ƒç´ çš„ 3D ç©ºé—´ï¼Œå­å…ƒç´ å°†ä¼šè¢«å¡è¿›å»*/
    transform-style: preserve-3d;
    position: relative;
    transition: 0.7s;
    border-radius: 5px;
}

.bottom > div {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-evenly;
}

.bottom > div h2 {
    color: #000;
}

.bottom > div input {
    width: 200px;
    height: 25px;
    padding: 0 10px;
    background-color: #ccd1e4;
    color: #2f3a8f;
}

.bottom button {
    width: 80px;
    height: 30px;
    background-color: #fe7e6d;
    color: #fff;
    border-radius: 10px;
    font-size: 15px;
    transition: 0.3s;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    cursor: pointer;
}

/* ç™»é™†å¡ç‰‡ï¼ˆç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡çœ‹è§çš„ï¼‰ */
.signIn {
    transform: translateZ(70px);
}

/*æ³¨å†Œå¡ç‰‡ï¼ˆç¿»è½¬åçœ‹è§çš„ï¼‰ */
.signUp {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    transform: translateZ(-70px) rotateY(180deg);
}
# JS æ ·å¼
button.addEventListener("click", () => {
    if (index == 0) {
        index = 1;
        ball.style.left = 61 + "%";
        on.style.opacity = 1;
        off.style.opacity = 0.5;
        bottom.style.transform = "rotateY(180deg)";
    } else {
        index = 0;
        ball.style.left = 0 + "%";
        on.style.opacity = 0.5;
        off.style.opacity = 1;
        bottom.style.transform = "rotateY(0deg)";
    }
});
